entry.title: You can deploy Map3 on AliCloud and AWS now
entry.summary: Using a cloud platform is an easy way for you run a node on the network. Once you set it up you don’t need to keep your computer on. It is flexible and versatile; it can be controlled with any devices in any location that is accessible to the interne...
